name: Gilo Ventures
overview: Gilo Ventures is a venture capital firm that seeks companies positioned for high growth technology markets with a US $1+ billion market potential. It prefers to invest in companies with proprietary technology. It also considers companies that possess first mover advantage and the potential to capture significant market share quickly. Gilo Ventures focus primarily on technologies and services for carrying and managing broadband communication over various platforms including fiber optics, wireless, copper. Its investments typically range in size from US $250,000 to $20 million.
